src:
Bos IMF Ingatkan Jokowi Ekonomi Dunia Loyo 10 Tahun Terakhir
04 Nov 2019, 03:57 by Achmad Dwi Afriyadi


Foto: Jokowi di KTT Asean (Twitter @jokowi)

Jakarta - Presiden Joko Widodo (Jokowi) bertemu dengan Managing Director IMF Kristalina Georgieva di sela-sela KTT ke-35 ASEAN di Bangkok, Thailand Minggu (3/11/2019) kemarin. Dalam pertemuan itu, Jokowi dan Kristalina membahas situasi ekonomi di global maupun kawasan.Mengutip laman Setkab, Senin (4/11/2019), Menteri Luar Negeri Retno Marsudi menjelaskan, pada pertemuan itu Kristalina menyampaikan ekonomi dunia mengalami perlambatan. Bahkan, pertumbuhannya terendah dalam satu dekade terakhir."Managing Director IMF menyampaikan bahwa ekonomi dunia mengalami slow down dan pertumbuhan mengalami pertumbuhan yang terendah dalam satu dekade, banyak sekali uncertainties," kata Retno dikutip detikcom.Di sisi lain, lanjut Retno, Kristalina mengatakan bahwa situasi Asia Tenggara cenderung menjadi lebih baik."To be more exact, beliau mengatakan bahwa ekonomi ASEAN masih berada di bright spot in the world economy, bright spot-nya ada di ASEAN," sambung Menlu.Retno melanjutkan, Presiden Jokowi akan melakukan sejumlah pengembangan prioritas seperti pembangunan sumber daya manusia dan pembangunan lainnya.Untuk diketahui, dalam pertemuan itu Jokowi didampingi Menko Bidang Polhukam Mahfud MD, Menko Bidang Perekonomian Airlangga Hartarto, Sekretaris Kabinet Pramono Anung, Menteri Luar Negeri Retno Marsudi, dan Menteri Perdagangan Agus Suparmanto. Simak Video "Pakar Nilai Alasan Jokowi Belum Keluarkan Perppu Mengada-ada"[Gambas:Video 20detik](ara/ara)
text:
IMF Boss Reminds Jokowi of Lacking World Economy in the Last 10 Years
Nov 04 2019, 03:57 by Achmad Dwi Afriyadi


Photo: Jokowi at the Asean Summit (Twitter @jokowi)

Jakarta - President Joko Widodo (Jokowi) met with IMF Managing Director Kristalina Georgieva on the sidelines of the ASEAN 35th Summit in Bangkok, Thailand Sunday (3/11/2019) yesterday. During the meeting, Jokowi and Kristalina discussed the economic situation in the global and regional regions. Citing the Setkab page, Monday (11/04/2019), Foreign Minister Retno Marsudi explained, at that meeting Kristalina conveyed that the world economy was experiencing a slowdown. In fact, the lowest growth in the last decade. "Managing Director of the IMF said that the world economy experienced a slow down and growth experienced the lowest growth in a decade, a lot of uncertainties," Retno was quoted as saying by AFP. On the other hand, Retno continued, Kristalina said that the Southeast Asian situation tends to get better. "To be more exact, he said that the ASEAN economy was still in the bright spot in the world economy, the bright spot was in ASEAN," continued the Foreign Minister. Retno continued, President Jokowi would conduct a number of developments priorities such as human resource development and other development. For information, Jokowi was accompanied by Coordinating Minister for Political, Law and Human Rights Mahfud MD, Coordinating Minister for Economic Affairs Airlangga Hartarto, Cabinet Secretary Pramono Anung, Foreign Minister Retno Marsudi, and Trade Minister Agus Suparmanto. Check out the video "Expert Value Reasons Jokowi Has Not Issued Perppu Made Up" [Gambas: Video 20 seconds] (fig / fig)
